explanation: [0-0] In a library, a young man wearing a gray T-shirt, black pants and white shoes stands in front of a yellow wooden bookshelf, smiling at the camera. He is making a "V" gesture with two fingers while holding onto the black handle of the bookshelf with his other hand. There are many similar bookshelves around, and the room's white ceiling and gray carpet can be seen.
[0-2] Then, the man lowers his right hand and starts turning a handle on the bookshelf to his right. After turning it a few times, he quickly runs away.
